name: Matthew Gorzelinski

image.alt: Profile picture where I’m in a white t-shirt on gray gradient background. Half of my face is in the shadow. The other half is correctly illuminated.
image.title: In reality, I'm nicer than I look in this picture. I assure you!

brief: I’m an engineer and humanist. In one? Is it legal?

portfolio.mention: I develop my technical skills and humanistic interests by designing, coding and writing content for websites. For that purpose I mainly use Figma, JAMstack, pen and paper. Effects of that development you can find in my

blog.mention: I learn new things every day, explore new fields of knowledge, rummage around the web and theorize too much. I share my findings and thoughts on my
